name: Kenka Banchou Bros. Tokyo Battle Royal
overview: Men use their fists to connect with each other. Kenka Banchou Bros bring a pair of boys as partners into the fray. Ikki and Kousuke are both from dysfunctional families, fights, ambition and each other are all they have. Players start off by choosing the boy they want to become and proceed the game through a series of missions.Since friendship is such an important aspect, gamers are encouraged to connect with others through the adhoc mode. Pair up, watch each others' back as you embark on a school trip to fight for the title of the Banchou of the banchous.
